reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: The Network of Religious and Traditional Peacemakers

description.narrative: Network for Religious and Traditional Peacemakers as an informal structure brings together actors from grassroots level religious and traditional peacemakers to international and intergovernmental organizations. Network activities focus on achieving sustai nable results at grassroots level and in order to do so it often applies a multi-track approach in supporting religious and traditional peacemakers. Network activities focus on ensuring that the full potential of religious and traditional peacemakers in pe acemaking peacebuilding and peace mediation across different tracks is acknowledged utilized and sufficiently supported. The aim of the Network is to improve the effectiveness of peace focused efforts through collaboratively supporting and strengthening th e positive role of religious and traditional actors in peace and peacebuilding processes.The Ministry of Foreign Affairs support to the Network falls under Finland?s overall pursuit and actions aimed to advance mediation as core to a more effective interna tional agenda focused on peace and development.in 2016 the MFA Finland contribution to the budget is 540 000 euros. FCA covers 559 530 euros.
